name: wepback-vsts-extension
description: webpack Visual Studio Team System (VSTS) Extension

scripts.setup-samples: npm run setup-sample-one && npm run setup-sample-two && npm run setup-sample-webpack2 && npm run setup-sample-webpack3 && npm run setup-sample-webpack3-with-issues && npm run setup-sample-webpack-ts-config
scripts.setup: npm run setup-samples && yarn && cd tasks/webpack-build-task && yarn
scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run build-without-setup
scripts.update-version-without-setup: npm run build-without-setup && npm run update-version
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run update-version && node node_modules/tfx-cli/_build/tfx-cli.js extension create --manifest-glob vss-extension.json --output-path ./dist
scripts.test-reporter: cd tasks/webpack-build-task && mocha tests/suite.js --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test-results.xml
scripts.test: npm run build-without-setup && cd tasks/webpack-build-task && mocha tests/suite.js

author: Dealogic
